description: Updates the BatchPredictionName of a BatchPrediction. You can use the GetBatchPrediction operation to view the contents of the updated data element.

parameters.name: BatchPredictionId
parameters.description: The ID assigned to the BatchPrediction during creation.

parameters.name: BatchPredictionName
parameters.description: A new user-supplied name or description of the BatchPrediction.

nested_items.name: BatchPredictionId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the BatchPrediction during creation. This value should be identical to the value of the BatchPredictionId in the request.
